item.title: Center and spread
item.description: Center-and-spread Little App: Household income (as a multiplier of the poverty level) versus whether the household owns or rents their home. Note the skew distribution for renters. Click here to launch. The Center-and-spread Little App displays a jittered point plot of the response variable, which can be annotated with a variety of statistics often used to quantify “center” and “spread.” Standard deviation “ruler” helps clarify that the sd is a distance rather than a value of the variable.
